name: Crazy Jelly-Jam Pop Heroes! Sweet Bubble Matching Game
name_original: Crazy Jelly-Jam Pop Heroes! Sweet Bubble Matching Game
description:
Enjoy a JELLYciously FUN matching game!

Play and match similar jellies to pop and clear them!
Match four or more jellies to receive AWESOME power-ups!

Match as many jellies and fill the progress bar to complete the level!
Use free boosts for difficult situations.

Download NOW and have an ENDLESS FUN playing!

Game Features:
>Plenty of JELLYcious FUN level!
>Bright and COLORFUL visual elements
>Boosts to help you in tight situation
